website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful gender-neutral cake topper for a quality price.
pros: Entwined hearts have no gender indication
Sits at a quality price point
Hand painted ivory color with stunning gold accents
Can be kept as a decorative piece long after your wedding
cons: Quite large and heavy, not ideal for smaller cakes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for cake topper. It was packaged well and no damage during shippping. Looks great. Can’t wait to see it on the cake!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty! But color didn’t go well with cream cheese icing
customer_reviews.text: Pretty! Great value for the price. Gave 4 stars though because the color looks more grey than white when used with a creamy colored icing. (Icing on cake is a cream cheese icing with no added coloring)
customer_reviews.author: Tessaro74

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Super pretty and feels high quality. Has a nice weight to it. This will be my wedding cake topper and it will make a very cute decoration/souvenir
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful memento
customer_reviews.text: This cake topper was so beautiful in person and matched the classic/romantic theme for our wedding. I was afraid it would be too heavy but it sat securely at the top of our 3 tier cake. I also got the matching serving set which was also just as beautiful! I'm also glad that we can save it as a decorative piece for our home. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer12

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This topper is very sturdy and pretty. I got this so that my mom could keep it out (instead of keeping it in a box in the closet) as it matches her distressed white furniture. I did spray it with edible peal glitter to give it a sheen that better matched the cake and we washed it off after the wedding. Would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: cahunt

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews mentioned, it is a bit on the heavy side but I don’t think too heavy for a cake (we will see). I liked the style and quality, my daughter can definitely use it for decoration at her home after the wedding. I would order it again.
customer_reviews.author: SchaumburgMom

customer_reviews.title: Statistically Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as shown in picture. Wish I would have bought other similar items from this collection.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE L MITCHELAR

customer_reviews.title: True vintage look and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! This truly looks vintage, not cheap or gaudy. It is heavy and won’t fall over. Will be a treasured keepsake if our special day! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table-topper-center piece!
customer_reviews.text: I got this last minute for my wedding. I love this table accent. It tied together our cake cutter and server, as well as our guest book pen. I imagine it would be a tad large for a cake topper, but I can see that working well if you have a larger cake. I hope to use this again for special occasions in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea49

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wedding cake topper. Great value and loved that I was able to find matching wine glasses and cake knife.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & great value!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect touch to our wedding cake. It matched perfectly and was sturdy and quality built. Definitely worth the price. The best part about it, is that after the wedding, it makes a great keepsake item to display in your home.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley McCain

customer_reviews.title: Beach wedding cake topper
customer_reviews.text: This product will be used as a wedding cake topper for my mom's beach wedding in a week or so. It arrived in plenty of time after ordering last week! It looks like driftwood but it will be a great keepsake after the whole experience! Would definitely recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Stormy

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: This topper is gorgeous! It is heavy though. Hopefully it won't fall through our cake. I can't wait to display it in our house after the wedding.
customer_reviews.author: nurseynurse88

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy for a cake. I ended up using this for a house decoration and buying a different topper.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Rae

customer_reviews.title: Great quality; very classy; well packaged; very pretty.
customer_reviews.text: This topper is simply beautiful. It is of very good quality, very classy. It makes for a perfect keepsake for the couple to cherish. I am so pleased I purchased this topper.
customer_reviews.author: Janet515

customer_reviews.title: Cake topper for wedding.
customer_reviews.text: Super super heavy, not sure how it will hold up on top of the cake. Not too impressed
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Frank

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wedding cake topper
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect topper for our wedding cake. It was a little heavy, so I made sure the baker had it in advance so the cake held it up okay. Since it is resin, but looks ceramic, it is sitting on a shelf in our LR on display as a wedding momento. I live it!
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Townes

customer_reviews.title: It is a lityle heavy , so make sure you put some pegs under it .
customer_reviews.text: Love the top peace , it has a vintage look , great for our 50th Anniversary.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Clinton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Picture doesn't do it justice very pretty very well made love it cant wait to use it !! Melissa
customer_reviews.author: Paul Carter

customer_reviews.title: Big and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Not light in weight but will work as a great wedding cake topper. Bigger than expected but still beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Kaela Swinson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our perfect day!!
customer_reviews.text: I struggled with finding a cake topper due to us having a blended family wedding but I found this beautiful topper and then when received could not have been more in love with everything about it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Harmon

customer_reviews.title: I love this. The picture doesn't do it justice
customer_reviews.text: I love this. The picture doesn't do it justice. Can't wait to see it on top of our wedding cake!!!! I think it will look great with our without flowers around it. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute. Nice craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: I like this item. I’m planning on using as my wedding cake topper. It does have a little weight to it for a topper but the baker said it’s doable. Plus it can also be used as decor.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Great piece
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece. Just Gave 4 starts bc it was a little too heavy as a cake Topper had to use 4 dowels to make surenit wouldn’t sink it. Other than that amazing and great as decoration if not for A cake Topper
customer_reviews.author: Izzy Sprinkles

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cake topper amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cake topper for our rustic cake! Absolutely beautiful in person!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This cake topper is exactly what I was dreaming and hoping for. It’s absolutely beautiful! If you love vintage and ivory items this is the perfect piece. It’s such a pretty accept and perfect topper for my cake. Very happy with my purchase and for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Vintage cake topper
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a cake topper. Matched my vintage theme. Was very beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, rustic and heavy.
customer_reviews.text: The vintage style double heart cake topper is really pretty. We used it on a winter themed wedding cake. Colors were ivory and evergreen with small pine cones. It was beautiful. Only downfall is the weight. It is very heavy, so you’ll want a sturdy or reinforced layer to hold it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a topper for a small wedding cake with a slightly rustic theme. It was absolutely perfect! It feels solid but not too heavy for the cake and cleaned up well so I can have it as a keepsake
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loved the topper
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved the topper. Went with everything we got and was beautiful although the cake was a total mess we were able to still sit this on the table and use it as a beautiful center piece.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie J. Bowensn

customer_reviews.title: too heavy
customer_reviews.text: very heavy, made cake compress and almost topple over in reception
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Nemechek

customer_reviews.title: Nice and heavy
customer_reviews.text: PRETTY. I bought them just to put on my table. No cake required
customer_reviews.author: Marie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Used it for an anniversary cake topper, everyone loved it
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Double Heart Cake Topper
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and is beautiful and well made. My daughter looking forward to using it on her wedding cake.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is great always has what I'm looking for..
customer_reviews.text: I like the double heart theme for my wedding. Love it for mycake.
customer_reviews.author: Beggie

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy not flimsy but nicely done
customer_reviews.text: This is just the right topper for somone who is having a second marriage and wants a little rustic thats not fussy and nice to display on a shelf or cabinet. It is just perfect
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: This cake topper made my vintage cake look so great
customer_reviews.author: Alvii

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful! Used it as my wedding cake topper and received compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Lazo

customer_reviews.title: Loved this..!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wedding cake. Very heavy and not cheap looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Matches Wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: It'll be perfect to match the glasses, serving utensils for the cake and guest book
customer_reviews.author: BarbR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this item! Every elegant and classy. it's way more than we expected!
customer_reviews.author: Mieya Glory

customer_reviews.title: Wooden hearts
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy for cake topper but we used as decor and were very pleased with this item!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Overton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little cake topper!
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I expected but worth every penny, it made our cake that much more special on our wedding day. This topper is simply beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Our Special Day
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful and helped achieve the look we were going for. It does have some weight to it but it sat on top of the cake with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kaeley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my double heart wedding!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the matching cake knife/server. Love all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Southerngirl1964

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece. We were very shocked on how heavy it actually is! But it worked for what we needed!
customer_reviews.author: Danya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Not too heavy and not a scratch. Wife ordered for our wedding cake topper and can't wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Foutz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful topper
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, lightweight and sturdy topper. Absolutely gorgeous. I love that you can purchase a matching serving set.
customer_reviews.author: Ambrose Family

customer_reviews.title: Very Beautiful, Bride and Groom loved them
customer_reviews.text: Very Beautiful, Bride and Groom loved them. I bought the matching serving set, and the toasting glasses. They were all a great hit.
customer_reviews.author: Linda McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Makes beautiful cake topper, centerpiece or surround by flowers. Solidly made. Using on cake table at wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect for small cake, not too heavy, wonderful keepsake. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful little piece. Exactly what I needed. Fit perfectly on top of my daughter's cake. Liked the vintage look of it. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey A.

customer_reviews.title: Picture does not give it justice!!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what this was going to look like when we received it, but it is very nice quality!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: The design was just as pictured and worked well for my wedding cake. A little heavy but worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Martin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this some peas it was used in my wedding in front of my fiancé and I sitting at the table with the wreath of flowers around it.
customer_reviews.author: VirginiaHartman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's super cute and perfect for my wedding. It's a good quality. It is a great price too. The end.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Diaz

customer_reviews.title: The color was not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: It was a little heavier than expected and the picture showed shades of brown but this was all an ivory color, no highlights of brown at all.
customer_reviews.author: Siamesesammie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture and perfect for my special day.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece alongside a wedding cake. Well made and arrived quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Zan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful and came on time and in one piece!
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER MORROW

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful wedding topper Very impressive quality and a great price. I love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Monte Coker

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality! Very heavy duty and looked beautiful as our cake topper!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Smith

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I loved this as my cake topper for my wedding. It was Heavy!!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie B

customer_reviews.title: Wedding Topper
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved it! Its a little heavier than I thought but it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Janessa Larmer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: My cake lady hand painted some gold brushstrokes on it, and wrote our names. It’s beautiful and now we can keep it on a shelf as decor!
customer_reviews.author: Evan Nottage

customer_reviews.title: Great style at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size, and it went well with our theme
customer_reviews.author: nunzio palazzotto

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than I thought but it was pretty. Looked great on the cake
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cake Topper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my rustic themed wedding coming up, and I was pleasantly suprised of the great quality. It is super sturdy and comes exactly as pictured. It is also not super light so I know it will stand up properly. I cant wait to use it for the day of!
customer_reviews.author: TheAmazonQueen

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: I loved the elegance and simplicity of this cake topper, the neutral color could work on any wedding cake. I was afraid it would be too big for my daughter's mini wedding cake but it actually looked amazing. She was pleased with it as a cake topper and the design now allows her to display it on a table along with her wedding photo.
customer_reviews.author: Tamera Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but a little heavy
customer_reviews.text: I gave this five stars simply because I love it! It was for our re-marriage ceremony 42 year’s. This was a little heavy for the small cake on top, started sinking in on one side. But, didn’t ruin anything.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Vintage Heart Fadhipncraft 2509
customer_reviews.text: The hearts were perfect decor for our bride and groom table. We placed it in the front center of small rectangle table with green vines. The table setting included our place, silverware and glassware. two beautiful flutes (with our first names & wedding date, which is a gift item). Our theme 'let love grow.' The hearts matched our cake knife and cake server pieces. We received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Goss

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Mine was broken.
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much, but mine arrived broken at the base. The box it was it was damaged while the Amazon box it was packaged in was just fine. I would have expected someone to have checked this out before shipping. Now the ones available are more expensive and I’m just really annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Meggan Drennan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleasantly surprised with this piece. It looks so beautiful online but in person it was even more beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Great design and quality!
customer_reviews.text: The design of the piece and its quality is amazing! I thought it was heavy but it's just ok. Also, the soze is just normal because it's not too small or too big. It will definitely be perfect for my wedding cake, yay! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: tram

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cute for a small and simple cake.
customer_reviews.text: My husband to be and I are doing up a very outdoor wedding, we painted ours in a dusty plum to latte gradient.
customer_reviews.author: Moezzy

customer_reviews.title: The size is perfect, and it makes such a lovely decoration all ...
customer_reviews.text: We are so excited to use this as our wedding cake topper! The size is perfect, and it makes such a lovely decoration all by itself! We are going to put it on display in our home after the wedding! Quality is good, the distress is just perfect! Added much later: we still have this on display in our home and I still completely adore it!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna M.

customer_reviews.title: Heart Cake Topper
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for the top of a wedding cake. The ornament is lovely but is way too heavy for a cake. Instead, I just used it as a decorative piece on the table which looked very nice. It is porcelain.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Bovell

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: This was our wedding cake topper. It was a little heavy for that but our cake designer figured out. Now it sits on our mantle as a wonderful reminder. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Maitreya Zohar

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Looked just like picture only negative thing I could say is it was a bit heavy for a cake topper
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: color not as shown
customer_reviews.text: it is more grey than cream I will keep but disappointed will not match my decor
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful for the price and it went with my Decour
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful for the price and it went with my Decour
customer_reviews.author: Kzer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. It’s is beautiful & priced well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was beautiful on the bridal table. It's sturdy and elegant
customer_reviews.author: Gayla

customer_reviews.title: The vintage look was perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Used with cream butter frosting. The vintage look was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Web

customer_reviews.title: Very lovely
customer_reviews.text: Very lovely cake topper. It is slightly heavier than most topper but still very pretty. The wedding couple are now using it as a display piece in their home
customer_reviews.author: Angela L. Folks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful. Bought for my sister and her fiance. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Cake Topper
customer_reviews.text: This cake topper was EVERYTHING! For the price, it was very sturdy with ample thickness and very high quality! The color is an off white to almost cream color, and very weighted & beautiful in person. I would highly recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

product_meta.title: Fashioncraft Vintage Style Double Heart Design Cake Topper/Centerpiece, One Size, Cream
feature_bullets: Vintage style double heart design cake topper/centerpiece
Two intertwined hearts symbolizing shared Eternal love
Hand painted in a vintage ivory color and accentuated with rubbed-in gold Leaf accents
Uplift any romantic occasion! use as a cake topper and matching centerpieces on your event tables
